items.title: Hotel Mansingh Palace
items.content: A comfortable, modern hotel in an interesting area of Agra, with plenty of shops and restaurants nearby. Mansingh Palace has an impressive marble lobby with a 24-hour coffee shop, a restaurant and an atmospheric, traditional bar. The rooms are well furnished and comfortable, and there is a swimming pool and a garden for relaxation, making this a pleasant place to spend time.

items.title: Hotel Taj Resorts
items.content: Located close to the Taj Mahal, this modern hotel has simple but clean and well-maintained rooms. Along with the Bon Appetit caf√© at lobby level, there is an open-air restaurant on the rooftop for evening meals. The rooftop also boasts a small swimming pool, and fabulous views of the Taj Mahal.

items.title: The Coral House Homestay
items.content: Pratibha & Sanjay have opened their delightful home to guests. There are 6 charming, colourfully-decorated rooms, and lovely shaded courtyards in which to relax and chat with the family and other guests. Delicious, home-cooked meals are served. The location is ideal, being in a quiet residential colony close to the Taj Mahal.

items.title: The Coral Tree Homestay
items.content: This six-room home-stay is just a short walk away from the entrance to the Taj Mahal. The bright, cheerful rooms, verandahs and garden are all decorated with interesting pieces of art. The well-travelled owners are keen to interact with their guests, and are full of ideas to help you to get the most out of your time in Agra.

items.title: The Grand Imperial
items.content: This 100-year-old building is testimony to India’s long and varied history. The low, white colonial building dating back to the Raj era is peppered with Mughal paintings and memorabilia, and was host at one time to the Crown Princes of England as well as to Mohammad Ali Jinnah. The wide lawn in the front, and the cupola-marked pool at the back complete the feel of a luxury heritage hotel.

items.title: The Oberoi Amarvilas
items.content: One of India’s most exclusive hotels, the Oberoi Amarvilas is the only hotel in Agra to offer unobstructed views of the Taj Mahal, merely 600 metres away. You have breathtaking views from throughout the complex - from the lobby, the restaurants, the bar, the swimming pool, and all of the sumptuous guest rooms and private balconies. Staying here is a memorable experience which will remain with you forever.

items.title: Trident Agra
items.content: An attractive superior hotel in Agra. This elegant low-rise building is situated in six acres of beautiful gardens. It has a beautiful lobby in green marble, a large swimming pool and a multi-cuisine brasserie. The centrally air-conditioned rooms have pleasing pastel shades and the floors are in local stone and covered with colourful dhurries.
